content.rendered:
Version 1.6

Released: November 12th, 2024 with WordPress 6.7

  • Fix unnecessary borders for linked images in the Whisper variation. (#57368)
  • Make index template heading text translatable. (#61951)
  • Update schema version in style variation files to ensure that settings and styles are properly handled by code editors that support schema. (#61789)
  • Add contributors to copyright notices. (#61943)

Version 1.5

Released: July 16th, 2024 with WordPress 6.6

  • Wrap Navigation block in a Row block within the header template part. (#60723)
  • Improve the background of the Aubergine variation in relation to the header and the page height. (#58475)
  • Add descriptions to patterns, for use in the block inserter. (#59688)
  • Remove untranslatable text strings in pagination links. (#60298)
  • Set theme.json schema version to 6.5, the last schema for version 2, instead of the development version at trunk. (#61342)
  • Update screenshot to show the front view without variation options. (#56949)

Version 1.4

Released: April 2nd, 2024 with WordPress 6.5

  • Update the XX-large font-sizes so that the responsive typography meets the minimum ratio between the min and max font-sizes of 0.61 required for accessible responsive typography.(#56603)
  • Include Latin-extended characters in DM Sans font files. (#59008)
  • Rename Comments template part to ‘Comments Template Part’, to reduce confusion with the ‘Comments’ block when viewing both in the inserter. (#56999)

Version 1.3

Released: November 7, 2023 with WordPress 6.4

  • Add font license information to readme.txt (#59483)

Version 1.2

Released: August 8, 2023 with WordPress 6.3

  • Add a border to Quote blocks on the front-end, for consistency with editor styles (#57506)
  • Fix Separator Block default styling, using a width of 100 pixels (#57667)
  • Allow changing Site Title font size in Marigold and Whisper styles (#57971)
  • Add style-variations tag in style.css (#58110)
  • Remove the perPage attribute where the query inherits from the global query (#58581)
  • Fix height of the featured images in the Archive, Home, Index, and Search templates to prevent expanding iframe bug (#58766)

Version 1.1

Released: March 29, 2023 with WordPress 6.2

  • #57175 – In “Blog (alternative)” template, make post titles links
  • #57245 – Aubergine has wrong gradient values
  • #57726 – Use the new /documentation/ URLs for HelpHub links in Bundled Themes.

Version 1.0

Released: November 2, 2022

Initial Release.
